pages.title: Build Structures
pages.text: The companion can build basic structures from blocks in its inventory.$(br2)Structure types:$(br2)$(li)$(bold)Wall$() — Vertical wall of specified dimensions$(li)$(bold)Floor$() — Flat platform$(li)$(bold)Platform$() — Elevated floor$(li)$(bold)Shelter$() — Basic enclosed room$(li)$(bold)Column$() — Vertical pillar$(br2)Example: $(thing)"Build a 5×3 cobblestone wall"$(br)$(thing)"Build a shelter from oak planks"$(br2)The companion uses blocks from its inventory. Give it the building materials first!
